title: I got kayle but no icon
body: As most people know riot is giving kayle and the riot kayle skin away along with an icon ,and I haven't gotten this icon yet but I have gotten the skin and champion.

replies.body: Not every gift will be received at the same time, and it's going to be a bit to distribute everything to every eligible account.  Stay up to date at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we continue to send out these gifts.  Patience!
Thank you very very much Porocles btw nice name.
